name: Synthesplode!
description:
This is a short original game by Jordan Grayson with a given prompt of "Chain Reaction." The base mechanic for this game is inspired by the AppStore game Chain Reaction. The math behind the grid explosion algorithm is inspired/based on a Sandpile model. The puzzle spin on this formula is original. This game was created during a one week period in Pico-8.

Author

The game design, art, programming, and sound effects for Synthesplode! were made by Jordan Grayson. The music was inspired by Robby Duguay but made by Jordan Grayson.
